She's confirmed for the new season, and given she was the first to declare Snow "king in the North" — and her home is shared by Daenerys' trusted knight Ser Jorah Mormont, who could return before greyscale disease turns him into an angry cobblestone street — Lyanna could have a key role to play.

She surely won't be far from the front once the war begins – and anyone still thinking thinks she's too young either needs to remember the Stark children's age when this mess started or rewatch Bella Ramsay's performance last season.
Armed with a steely glare, unwavering resolve and a whole 62 soldiers who fought for Jon Snow in the Battle of the Bastards, this teenage leader of tiny Bear Island was a favorite from Season 6.
